briefTitle: Effect of Chan-Chuang Qigong With Breathing Meditation on Quality of Life in Patients With Breast Cancer
officialTitle: Effect of Chan-Chuang Qigong With Breathing Meditation on Quality of Life in Patients With Breast Cancer
conditions: Breast Cancer, Quality of Life, Intraoperative Awareness
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Change in European Organization for Research and Treatment of Cancer Quality of Life Questionnaire(EORTC QLQ-C30) scores
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

1. aged ≥20
2. diagnosed with breast cancer (stages I and II)
3. before receiving chemotherapy
4. conscious clear to communicate.

Exclusion Criteria:

1. severe cardiopulmonary, liver or kidney dysfunction
2. the original law of qigong cases.
